dialogue: Huh? Oh no, sorry I haven't seen any parents coming this way I think. Though the path does fork and have many entrances and exits, so maybe they came in through another way.
It's a fun little spot, takes a small amount of ~finess~ to navigate, but you seem like the type not to flee from such a challenge
Hmm, although, when I decided to protect this spot I made some rules ok. Just for your own safety. You gotta have enough fireflies before I'll let you in Ok?
